title: Monsters
description: Marcia, Phil and Ben catch up with Ben Grimm (The Thing) and get a first-hand account of the Fantastic Four’s clash with Galactus from a member of the super team. Starring AnnaSophia Robb as Marcia Hardesty; Seth Barrish as Phil Sheldon; Method Man as Ben Urich; Jake Hart as Ben Grimm; Juliet Brett as Alicia Masters.
author: originals@stitcher.com (MARVELS)
